colour.models.dataset.eci_rgb_v2 Module¶

ECI RGB v2 Colourspace¶

Defines the ECI RGB v2 colourspace:

  • ECI_RGB_V2_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces IPython Notebook

References

[1]European Color Initiative. (2002). ECI RGB v2. Retrieved from http://www.eci.org/_media/downloads/icc_profiles_from_eci/ecirgbv20.zip
colour.models.dataset.eci_rgb_v2.ECI_RGB_V2_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.67010309, 0.32989691], [ 0.20990566, 0.70990566], [ 0.14006179, 0.08032956]])¶

ECI RGB v2 colourspace primaries.

ECI_RGB_V2_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

ECI_RGB_V_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.dataset.eci_rgb_v2.ECI_RGB_V2_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 6.50212758e-01, 1.77962861e-01, 1.36036375e-01], [ 3.20104742e-01, 6.01874395e-01, 7.80208624e-02], [ -5.38634415e-17, 6.79858121e-02, 7.57202472e-01]])¶
